text: The Saudi Prince and his delegation arrived in the island on an invitation extended by the Foreign Minister Karunanayake.During the discussion, attention was drawn to further strengthen the bilateral ties between Saudi Arabia and Sri Lanka.State Minister of Foreign Affairs Wasantha Senanayake was also present on this occasion.Prince of Saudi Arabia Alwaleed Bin Talal Abdulaziz Al Saud, who is on an official visit to Sri Lanka called on Foreign Minister Ravi Karunanayake yesterday (4th July). The Saudi Prince and his delegation arrived in the island on an invitation extended by the Foreign Minister Karunanayake.During the discussion, attention was drawn to further strengthen the bilateral ties between Saudi Arabia and Sri Lanka.State Minister of Foreign Affairs Wasantha Senanayake was also present on this occasion.
title: Visiting Saudi Prince calls on Foreign Minister
